text:
Technical Sales Executive
Location: Southampton or within 1 hour commutable
(Office based at Phi House, Southampton initially then hybrid role to allow working from home)
Salary: Competitive salary + bonus + car allowance + contributory pension.
Contract: Full Time, Permanent
The purpose of this role is to form a main point of Customer interaction for the Business Development & Marketing team in order to achieve the objective of acquiring new business and maintaining existing customers thereby delivering sustainable market growth for DEKRA Organisational & Process Safety.
Main Duties & Responsibilities:
Selling Service (eg’s include HAZOP, DSEAR/ATEX, OBRA, COMAH, Cyber PS), laboratory testing and instruments
Identifying, developing, and realising sales revenue with new customers, business Technical Sales Executive
Location: Southampton or within 1 hour commutable
(Office based at Phi House, Southampton initially then hybrid role to allow working from home)
Salary: Competitive salary + bonus + car allowance + contributory pension.
Contract: Full Time, Permanent
The purpose of this role is to form a main point of Customer interaction for the Business Development & Marketing team in order to achieve the objective of acquiring new business and maintaining existing customers thereby delivering sustainable market growth for DEKRA Organisational & Process Safety.
Main Duties & Responsibilities:
Selling Service (eg’s include HAZOP, DSEAR/ATEX, OBRA, COMAH, Cyber PS), laboratory testing and instruments
Identifying, developing, and realising sales revenue with new customers, business and product opportunities
Issuing quotations and converting these to orders
Identifying and developing opportunities for allied DEKRA business units
Global partnership in collaboration with other members of the Business Development & Marketing team
Attending exhibitions, conferences, etc. as agreed with the Business Development Manager
Managing day to day sales at accounts in collaboration with other members of the Business Development & Marketing team to maximise the overall business development and sales performance
Identifying and establishing direct contacts at appropriate levels within the Customer organisation and correctly ascertaining their business requirements
Working in collaboration with the Marketing team to develop marketing collateral
Working with sales support in providing details of contacts and customers
Meet a specific sales plan and manage a sales territory in the southeast as agreed by your Business Development Manager
Providing a focal point for contact with your customer base
Knowledge, Experience & Qualifications:
The Technical Sales Executive requires excellent interpersonal skills and the clear ability to interact and communicate effectively with Customers.  Exemplary prioritisation and time management skills are required to maximise efficiency in this role. A degree in Chemistry or another scientific discipline is mandatory for this role.
The successful candidate will be a graduate with at least 5 years of technical sales experience developed in an engineering/scientific environment.  Competent in the use of the following software:
Windows 10
MS Word (including mail merge functions)
SAP (Globex) / Cloud for Customer (C4C)
Outlook Email
Excel
PowerPoint
MS Teams
If you feel you have the necessary skills and experience to be successful in this role, click on “APPLY” today, forwarding an up-to-date copy of your CV for consideration in the first instance!
No agencies please or requirement for work VISAs as DEKRA UK Ltd are not sponsors.

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
